code: import React from'react';import{connect}from'react-redux';import taskReducer from'../../redux/task_reducer';import{createTask,appointAnExecutor,getMyListTask}from'../../redux/task_reducer';import Main from'./main.js';import{getItems}from'../../redux/items_reducer.js';var mapStateToprops=function mapStateToprops(state){return{task:state.task.newTask,myTaskId:state.task.myTaskId};};var MainContainer=connect(mapStateToprops,{createTask:createTask,appointAnExecutor:appointAnExecutor,getItems:getItems,getMyListTask:getMyListTask})(Main);export default MainContainer;
